text: Carroll Baker (born May 28, 1931) is an American actress. She is known for her role in Baby Doll in 1956. Her role in the movie earned her BAFTA and Oscar nominations for Best Actress, as well as a Golden Globe award for Most Promising Newcomer that year. Her other early movie roles included George Stevens' Giant (1956), playing the love interest of James Dean, and in the romantic comedy But Not for Me (1959). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American autobiographers Category:Writers from Pennsylvania Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:People from Johnstown, Pennsylvania Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: Carroll Baker
